name: 生き甲斐 — IKIGAI
description:
Controllers: 
[ F11 ] - Full Screen (Web Browser)
[ MOUSE ] - User Interface & Buttons
[ UP ARROW ] / [ W ] & [ DOWN ARROW ] / [ S ] - Push & Pull Sphere
[ LEFT ARROW ] / [ A ] & [ RIGHT ARROW ] / [ D ] - Rotate View L/R

Part of Junior Programmer Pathway at Unity Learn: Bonus Features IV.

The prototype was created for educational purposes only,
feel free to watch the gameplay.

I challenge you to experience it or even become our coffee machine gun.

All donations will support the near development of new gaming
experiences and are shared among contributors.

Stay in touch & support... 🔫 ☕ ;)
